definition: the act of catching an object with the hands, to make grasping motions
details:
noun
- the act of catching an object with the hands
= synonyms: catch
- a weightlift in which the barbell is lifted overhead in one rapid motion
- (law) the unlawful act of capturing and carrying away a person against their will and holding them in false imprisonment
= synonyms: kidnapping
- obscene terms for female genitals
= synonyms: pussy, puss, slit, twat
- a small fragment
= example: a small fragment
= synonyms: bit
verb
- to make grasping motions
= example: to make grasping motions
- to grasp hastily or eagerly
= example: to grasp hastily or eagerly
= synonyms: snap
- take away to an undisclosed location against their will and usually in order to extract a ransom
= synonyms: nobble, kidnap, abduct
